title: 52. Money Talk: Setting Your Beauty Biz Up For Sucess + Financial Confidence with a CFO + Accounting Guru
description:
This episode is sponsored by Podcorn!

Explore sponsorship opportunities with Podcorn and start monetizing your podcast by signing up here: https://podcorn.com/podcasters/

Hi Roomies!! Today we are discussing finances and how to run a profitable business, tips for preparing to open your own business, and how to keep feel confident in dealing with money.

Exclusive show offers:

Access to a financial goal setting worksheet | This financial planning tool will help your listeners build a strong foundation for success through goal setting, planning, and financial education. The link to gain access will be www.profitplannerbookkeeping.com/treatmentroom

1-year intro rate on bookkeeping services | Kickstart Accounting starting at $99/month, depending on revenue size. To see if you'd be a good fit, you can schedule a call using this link (https://calendly.com/kickstartaccounting/discovery) and share podcast name The Treatment Room to claim the offer.

Find Danielle:

www.profitplannerbooks.com

www.kickstartaccountinginc.com

IG: @daniellehayden_oh @kickstartaccounting

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DanielleHaydenOH || https://www.facebook.com/kickstartaccountinginc/


Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa.dermaplus

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com

Music by LiQwYd 

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
